tourGuide - package tourGuide

tourGuide.user - package tourGuide.user
 
TourGuideController - Class in tourGuide.controller
RestController for TourGuide endpoints
TourGuideController() - Constructor for class tourGuide.controller.TourGuideController
 
TourGuideModule - Class in tourGuide.module
TourGuideModule is a configuration class to enable the use of the external libraries used.
TourGuideModule() - Constructor for class tourGuide.module.TourGuideModule
 
TourGuideService - Class in tourGuide.service
TourGuideService performs operations for TourGuideController, as well as performing services for Tracker thread
TourGuideService(GpsService, RewardsService, UserService, TripService) - Constructor for class tourGuide.service.TourGuideService
 
trackAllUserLocations() - Method in class tourGuide.service.TourGuideService
Track all users' current location For each user: Gets users location from GpsService Then adds this location to user's visited locations
trackAllUserLocationsAndProcess() - Method in class tourGuide.service.TourGuideService
Track all users' current location, then check if any new rewards are triggered For each user: Gets users location from GpsService Then adds this location to user's visited locations Then asks reward service to calculate user's rewards to update with new location
tracker - Variable in class tourGuide.service.TourGuideService
 
Tracker - Class in tourGuide.tracker
Tracker thread regularly prompts TourGuideService to track user locations and process any new rewards
Tracker(TourGuideService) - Constructor for class tourGuide.tracker.Tracker
 
trackUserLocation(User) - Method in class tourGuide.service.TourGuideService
Track user's current location Gets users location from GpsService Then adds this location to user's visited locations Then asks reward service to calculate user's rewards to update with new location
TripService - Class in tourGuide.service
TripService interfaces with TripPricer and performs associated tasks for main TourGuide application
TripService(TripPricer) - Constructor for class tourGuide.service.TripService
